Hey John,

I work for Meteor Development Group in SF with Marc Holmes, who used to work on the Visual Studio team. Marc speaks very highly of you and we’re hoping you could help us out a bit.

Meteor is the JavaScript app platform and we’re hiring an Evangelist to help spread the gospel of Meteor. Curious to know if you could either retweet our job post to your network or if you could point us in the right direction for good candidates. It can be a remote position so we’d hire someone to work from just about anywhere.

Hope to hear from you soon.
